Name: angular-index-page
Body: {%- capture kebabName %}{{ model.Table.Name | KebabCase | Singular }}{% endcapture -%}
{%- capture className %}{{ model.Table.Name | UpperCamel | Singular }}{% endcapture -%}
{%- capture propertyName %}{{ model.Table.Name | LowerCamel | Singular  }}{% endcapture -%}
{% for item in model.Table.Columns %}{% capture itemName %}{{ item.Name | LowerCamel | Singular }}{% endcapture %}{% capture dataType -%}{{ item.DataType | CSharp }}{%- endcapture %}
<input matInput [matDatepicker]="{{ itemName  }}Dtpicker" placeholder="Choose a date" formControlName="{{ itemName }}" {% if item.IsNullable == false %}required{% endif %}>
<mat-select placeholder="{{ itemName }}" formControlName="{{ itemName }}" {% if item.IsNullable == false %}required{% endif %}>
<input matInput type="number" placeholder="{{ itemName }}" formControlName="{{ itemName }}" {% if item.IsNullable == false %}required{% endif %}>
<mat-checkbox formControlName="{{ itemName }}" {% if item.IsNullable == false %}required{% endif %}>{{ itemName }}</mat-checkbox>
<textarea matInput cols="5" maxlength="{{item.Length}}" placeholder="{{ itemName }}" formControlName="{{ itemName }}"{% if item.IsNullable == false %} required{% endif %}></textarea>
<input matInput type="text" placeholder="{{ itemName }}" formControlName="{{ itemName }}"{% if item.IsNullable == false %} required{% endif %}>
